options.name: Create
options.description: Create an account

options.name: Create or Update
options.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an account

options.name: Get
options.description: Get an account

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many accounts

options.name: Update
options.description: Update an account

properties.name: accountName
properties.description: Name of the account. If a record with this account name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

options.name: Account_Site
options.description: Name of the accountâ€™s location, e.g. Headquarters or London

options.name: Account_Type
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Currency
options.description: Symbol of the currency in which revenue is generated

options.name: customFields
options.description: Filter by custom fields

values.name: fieldId
values.description: Custom field to set a value to

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set on custom field

options.name: Employees
options.description: Number of employees in the accountâ€™s company

options.name: Exchange_Rate
options.description: Exchange rate of the default currency to the home currency

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of the account to delete. Can be found at the end of the URL.

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of the account to retrieve. Can be found at the end of the URL.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: approved
options.description: Whether to retrieve only approved records. Defaults to true.

options.name: converted
options.description: Whether to retrieve only converted records. Defaults to false.

options.name: fields
options.description: Return only these fields

options.name: include_child
options.description: Whether to retrieve only records from child territories

options.name: sort_by
options.description: Field to sort records by

options.name: sort_order
options.description: Ascending or descending order sort order

options.name: territory_id
options.description: Retrieve only records from this territory

options.name: dealId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Discount
options.description: Discount applied to the sales order. For example, enter 12 for 12%.

options.name: Exchange_Rate
options.description: Exchange rate of the default currency to the home currency

options.name: Grand_Total
options.description: Total amount for the product after deducting tax and discounts

options.name: SO_Number
options.description: ID of the sales order after creating a case

options.name: Sales_Commission
options.description: Commission of sales person on deal closure as a percentage. For example, enter 12 for 12%.

options.name: Status
options.description: Status of the sales order. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: Sub_Total
options.description: Total amount for the product excluding tax

options.name: Tax
options.description: Tax amount as the sum of sales tax and value-added tax

options.name: Terms_and_Conditions
options.description: Terms and conditions associated with the purchase order

properties.name: salesOrderId
properties.description: ID of the sales order to delete

properties.name: salesOrderId
properties.description: ID of the sales order to retrieve

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: approved
options.description: Whether to retrieve only approved records. Defaults to true.

options.name: converted
options.description: Whether to retrieve only converted records. Defaults to false.

options.name: fields
options.description: Return only these fields

options.name: include_child
options.description: Whether to retrieve only records from child territories

options.name: sort_by
options.description: Field to sort records by

options.name: sort_order
options.description: Ascending or descending order sort order

options.name: territory_id
options.description: Retrieve only records from this territory

properties.name: salesOrderId
properties.description: ID of the sales order to update

options.name: accountId
options.description: ID of the account associated with this invoice. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: Adjustment
options.description: Adjustment in the grand total, if any

options.name: Carrier
options.description: Name of the carrier

options.name: contactId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Currency
options.description: Symbol of the currency in which revenue is generated

options.name: customFields
options.description: Filter by custom fields
